trans-unit.source: When this event is raised by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents" /> class, this object is always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents" /> 类引发此事件时，此对象总是为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示用来处理 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理方法关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler> type to monitor the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler>类型来监视<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents>类。
